comment: говорят радикалы, если усроили на нас и традиционалистов засаду

languages.text: "Стоять, приспешники Тисифоны! Чтобы остановить вас, нам пришлось вновь объединиться с ксеносами... Пусть так. Небольшая цена за гибель проклятого Дитя".

traits.locale_text: [драфт] Ну здравствуйте, не ожидали нас здесь увидеть?

languages.text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."
languages.original_text: "Стоять, приспешники Тисифоны! Чтобы остановить вас, нам пришлось вновь объединиться с ксеносами... Пусть так. Небольшая цена за гибель проклятого Дитя".

traits.locale_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."
"Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."
"Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."
"Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."
"Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

languages.text: « Halte, suppôts de Tisiphone ! Une fois de plus, nous avons dû nous allier aux xénos pour vous arrêter... Mais qu'importe. Ce n'est qu'un modeste prix à payer pour la mort de l'Enfant maudite. »
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: « Halte, suppôts de Tisiphone ! Une fois de plus, nous avons dû nous allier aux xénos pour vous arrêter... Mais qu'importe. Ce n'est qu'un modeste prix à payer pour la mort de l'enfant maudit. »

languages.text: 「止まれ、ティシフォンの手下め！お前を止めるために、もう一度異種族と手を組まなければならなかったのだぞ…だがもうどうでもいい。呪われし子の死と引き換えに払う代償としては安いものだからな」
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: 「止まれ、ティシフォンの手下め！お前を止めるために、もう一度異種族と手を組まなければならなかったのだぞ…だがもうどうでもいい。呪われし子の死と引き換えに払う代償としては安いものだからな」

languages.text: “站住，提西福涅的爪牙！为了阻止你们，我们不得不再次与异形结盟……不过不要紧，只要能杀了那个被诅咒的孩子，这不过是小小的代价罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: “站住，提西福涅的爪牙！为了阻止你们，我们不得不再次与异形结盟……不过不要紧，只要能杀了那个被诅咒的孩子，这不过是小小的代价罢了。”

languages.text: "Halt, Tisiphones Schergen! Wir mussten uns erneut mit den Xenos verbünden, um Euch aufzuhalten ... Gleichgültig. Das ist ein kleiner Preis für den Tod des verfluchten Kindes."
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: "Halt, Tisiphones Schergen! Wir mussten uns erneut mit den Xenos verbünden, um Euch aufzuhalten ... Gleichgültig. Das ist ein kleiner Preis für den Tod des verfluchten Kindes."

languages.text: «¡Alto, esbirros de Tisiphone! Hemos tenido que aliarnos una vez más con los xenos para deteneros... Tanto da. Es un precio pequeño por la muerte de la niña maldita».
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto, esbirros de Tisiphone! Hemos tenido que aliarnos una vez más con los xenos para deteneros... Tanto da. Es un precio pequeño por la muerte de la niña maldita».

languages.text: "Hele durun Tisiphone'nin yardakçıları! Sizi durdurmak için yeniden zenolarla ittifak kurmamız gerekti... Önemi yok. Lanetli Çocuk'un ölmesi için böyle ufak bir bedel ödenebilir."
languages.original_text: "Halt, Tisiphone's minions! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you... No matter. It is a small price to pay for the death of the cursed Child."

traits.locale_text: "Hele durun Tisiphone'nin yardakçıları! Sizi durdurmak için yeniden zenolarla ittifak kurmamız gerekti... Önemi yok. Lanetli Çocuk'un ölmesi için böyle ufak bir bedel ödenebilir."
